tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went to DentalRoots for misaligned teeth of my 8 year  old son. I found the clinic well cleaned and well managed .Dr Anju was punctual in our appointment and made my son extremely comfortable for treatment by his friendly manner.
she then explained the treatment and charges in detail answerd all our queries with patience.
They provided habit breaking appliance to my son and amazingly the misaligned teeth started to straighten in the first week only.
I found there charges nominal as per the services they are providing.
There experience is there strength . I found huge number of patients in there clinic every time I visit.
I recommend dental roots

I visited for wisdom tooth extraction,but first she understands the problem and then she will explain the solution, and most important while doing RCT if paining Dr Anju Thomas will keep on asking that whether pain is there or not. Very Friendly and Give you the best possible solution.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: visited Dental roots after reading the reviews but i will not recommend it anyone. as my experience is not good.I had visited a month back for tooth ache, and it came out that it was tooth decay. Doctor suggested the filling for that tooth. I was charged 1200 for that filling with no cleaning of other teeth and filling came out within a month. now have to go for filling again.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: My grandmother visited this clinic for a denture related issue.doctor Anju Thomas is specialised in dentures so she was able to to identify the real root cause and provide us a very effective fix in just one meeting and she was able to correct  issues with the denture,which we got it from outside really nice treatment and really comfortable if you are planning for any denture, I really recommend this clinic

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited this clinic for my daughters wisdom tooth surgery main doctor anju explains treatmen t plan  and made us aware of the treatment procedures .surgery took around 30 to 40 minutes later some medicines were prescribed, got it from outside medical lab pharmacy after 2-days al pain stopped.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: One of my colleague in IBM suggested dr. Anju Thomas. this Clinic is located at Indira nagar close to our office. It was really a nice experience compared to other clinics in Bangalore . Treatment was very smooth and Doctor very well explained all the procedures before starting the treatment thanks team dental roots

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I suggest whitening treatment at least before marriage or such important function.  I was able to see a clear difference before and after the whitening even though it's little sensitive for 1 or 2 days. it is a good feeling that all the stains are removed and colour also improved

review:

Dental roots ...keep it up

review:
**** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** ** *** ** ********* * Firstly about the ambiance, it is amazingly beautiful place to get your treatment done. Well equipped, modern setup and clean environment.
Secondly, the doctors are too good , friendly and well mannered. The overall staff at dental roots are professionally well behaved.
Thirdly the treatment done there is outstanding and satisfying.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: Awesome Dentistry at Dental Roots!!! I had my wisdom tooth removed by the very professional kind and sensitive. I really appreciate the care and effort put into making me feel at ease . The procedure lasted less than a minute & completely painless !!! Compliments to all the staff and front desk for keeping and managing the clinic so well !!! They get high points for hygiene ( in this post COVID19 era) !!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: BPS Dentures Fixing,Implant Supported Denture Fixing,
review: One of the most splendid dental care specialists in Bangalore with a complete in-house dental practice, you can be rest assured that you are in very safe hands of dentists specializing in almost all possible arenas. I have visited the clinic multiple times and have found them extremely efficient in handling my and my family's dental issues. Specially when it comes to implants, I would suggest them hands down.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Despite booking a teeth cleaning, the dentist advised that it was not necessary. She claimed there was no cavity on the tooth in question then suggested a different tooth might have a small cavity but better to just let it be than take care of it. 

Went to another dentist* ***** ***** *** ***** **** ******* **** * ******* ******** *** *** *** *** *** ******* *** * ***** ****** **** ****** ***** ****** ******** **** *** *************** 

Have never experienced a dentist with such a disregard for dental health

She's very mental health friendly and polite. Does not judge. Reasonable fees and charges.  
The staff was friendly and competent.
Doctor was polite, she listened to my issue patiently, offered treatment and gave suggestions that were to-the-point.
The doctor was quick, efficient and friendly. She explained the next steps clearly. Would consult her again if required.

The doctor is very gentle and calm. Listens to your problem carefully and understands what treatment needs to be performed. Very friendly and highly recommended . She is very gentle and patient with during her work.
